Articles.Content:
Hi everyone. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

After building a space shuttle in KSP 0.25 with mods i wanted to build a shuttle in 1.0 all-stock. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

For a long time I thought that it is impossible... Until now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![image.jpg](http://s4.postimg.org/tel6u4jhp/image.jpg)

Enjoy and tell me what do You think ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ajhmA3INaLI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ajhmA3INaLI)

PS: Sorry for 4:3 aspect ratio, I have a square monitor :c

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T09:46:25Z" title="05/17/2015 09:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by GB\_Kerbonaut**
Good job, it works and looks great. Is it capable of ferrying fuel (e.g. the X200-32 half-jumbo tank) to space?

Hi

Very nice movie!

Care to make a screenshot guide on how to build the shuttle in stock ?

Thanks a lot!

Hi again! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thank You, I'm glad that You like my shuttle ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Good job, it works and looks great. Is it capable of ferrying fuel (e.g. the X200-32 half-jumbo tank) to space?

I do not really tested it with payload yet. I was thinking about putting in some fuel tanks and possibly get it to the Mun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hi
> Very nice movie!
> 
> Care to make a screenshot guide on how to build the shuttle in stock ?
> 
> Thanks a lot!

Hmm, maybe I could do that ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
